description: When you think of it, browsers can be the perfect environment for running all sorts of workloads - Everybody has them, each tab is an isolated environment and they have a very rich API. So why not use the browsers in your organizations to act as containers to run your workloads and save money on servers? In this session Iâ€™ll explain the concept and demonstrate it running javascript (of course!) tasks for AI, concurrent batching and more.
title: Browsers are the new containers!
